platinum hostels

Unforgettable moments. Unbeatable value. Welcome to Platinum Hostels, where college adventures come alive!

about us

Welcome to Platinum Hostels, where college life is elevated to new heights. We are a trusted and vibrant community that goes beyond just providing accommodations. With over a decade of experience, we offer the perfect blend of comfort, affordability, and a lively atmosphere. Our beautifully designed spaces create a cozy retreat for students after classes or adventures. We take pride in curating an inclusive environment that fosters connections, lifelong friendships, and personal growth. Join us and become part of the Platinum Hostels legacy, where every student's story is celebrated.

hear from our community

  Absolutely loved my stay at Platinum Hostels! The atmosphere was electric, the staff was friendly and helpful, and the facilities were top-notch. Highly recommended for any college student looking for an unforgettable experience. 5 stars!  

Kwame Mensah, bomso

 I can't recommend Platinum Hostels enough! From the moment I arrived, I felt welcomed and valued. The rooms were spacious and cozy, and the staff was always available to assist. Platinum Hostels made my college visit to Ghana unforgettable!  

hannah fortner, bomso

  Staying at Platinum Hostels was a fantastic decision. The social activities organized by the hostel created an incredible sense of community. The amenities were great, and I made lifelong friends during my stay. Truly a remarkable experience!  

Sam Boateng, gaza

  Platinum Hostels exceeded my expectations! The rooms were clean, the staff was welcoming, and the location was perfect. I had a memorable and enjoyable stay. Highly recommended!  

Masha Ali, ayeduase

  The vibrant atmosphere, comfortable rooms, and friendly staff made my stay truly memorable. I highly recommend Platinum Hostels to fellow college students seeking a remarkable experience.  

Kgosi Mokoena, ayeduase
